required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Clinical Trial of Group ACYW135 Meningococcal Polysaccharide Vaccine 002
clinical_study.official_title: Phase II Clinical Trial of Group ACYW135 Meningococcal Polysaccharide Vaccine

brief_summary.textblock: The clinical trial was designed to evaluate the safety and immunogenicity against Group ACYW135 Meningococcal Polysaccharide Vaccine of Hualan administered on subjects 2 years of age and older.

detailed_description.textblock:
Complying with requirements of the approval letter of clinical trial issued by SFDA (Approval Letter No.: 2006L01017), Hualan conducted phase II clinical trial of Group ACYW135 Meningococcal Polysaccharide Vaccine to evaluate the safety and immunogenicity of the experimental vaccine.
The safety end points were the presence of any systemic, local and adverse reaction. Evaluation indicators of immunogenicity were bacteriocin levels of groups A, C, Y and W135 respectively in the serum after the whole vaccination.

primary_outcome.description: Systemic and local adverse reactions after the vaccination; adverse events

secondary_outcome.description: 4-fold (seroconversion) and 8-fold increase of bactericidin; GMT and bactericidin increase after immunization

intervention.description: 360 subjects were divided into three groups (120 subjects in each group), children (2~6 years of age), early youth (7~15 years of age) and adult (16~30 years of age) to receive Group ACYW135 Meningococcal Polysaccharide Vaccine, 0.5 ml, one dose regime

overall_official.affiliation: Immunization Program Institute of Jiangsu Provincial Center for Disease Control and Prevention
